channel.title: HTML on Polyglott
channel.description: Recent content in HTML on Polyglott

item.title: Web Components
item.author: ottog2486@gmail.com (Otto Giron)
item.description: Web components is a set of standards which brings technologies we were used to, but normally provided by frameworks or libraries such angular, ember, knockout (among others). Web Components standard natively supports in the web browser custom HTML elements, HTML imports and templates, also “shadow DOM” which extends the current DOM specification providing boundaries and better encapsulation between DOM trees.
